subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Saying he never could have imagined playing more than 1,000 N.H.L. games and winning four Stanley Cups, Detroit Red Wings forward Kirk Maltby announced his retirement on Tuesday.
snippet: Saying he never could have imagined playing more than 1,000 N.H.L. games and winning four Stanley Cups, Detroit Red Wings forward Kirk Maltby announced his retirement on Tuesday.
